name: Mariusz Jan Skobel
profile_summary: Site Reliability Engineer with 10+ years of experience in delivering high-performance, reliable backend systems in demanding environments like healthcare and finance. Proficient in **load balancing**, **autoscaling**, **queuing systems**, and **low-latency realtime systems**, ensuring optimal performance and uptime. Skilled in **long-running task management** and **container deployment** for robust cloud-agnostic solutions. Demonstrates hands-on expertise in monitoring and performance analysis using **Datadog**, alongside building cloud-native applications on **Azure** and **AWS**. Strong track record in developing microservices architecture, event-driven systems, and CI/CD automation that align with compliance standards like HIPAA, FHIR, PCI DSS, and SOC 2. Brings practical experience in MLOps, managing production workflows with tools such as **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow**. Committed to collaboration and ownership, driving iteration speed while ensuring systems are both technically sound and impactful.
